decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (7135-01, 7135-02, 7135-03, 7135-04, 7135-05, 7135-06, 7135-07, 7135-08, 7135-09, 7135-10, 7135-11, 7135-12, 7135-13, 7135-PH, 7135-BP, Design & Access Statement,  Flood Risk Assessment. Received: 20/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension with roof windows to both houses
